Text: Save Off Your next Hertz RentalDear Shelley Corman Save on Your next Weekend or Weekly Rental Get Off Weekend or Weekly rates when you rent a FullSize door vehicle or larger Youll also get Off Weekend or Weekly rates on any Compact or MidSize vehicles Whether youre traveling for a week or for a weekend youll enjoy these extra savings Click on the links below to view all the details of these offers speclinkcfmcpcodeEMgotourlspecweekend speclinkcfmcpcodeEMgotourlspecweekly To review Hertz Privacy Policy please click here companyprivacyindexhtml This email was automatically generated from a nonresponse mailbox To contact us regarding this message or regarding your Hertz Club Gold membership please click here mailto We will gladly respond to your email within hours TO CANCEL FUTURE EMAIL DELIVERY OR UPDATE YOUR EMAIL ADDRESS To unsubscribe from future email delivery by Hertz or to update your email address please click on the link below to access your Club Gold profile and change your option in the Customers Choice to Limit Use of Data section servgoldmembernewcfm
